name: N.O.C-TAINER KIT
description:
This is a unique product from Night Owl Connoisseurs.
A great gift, or even a stocking filler!

includes...

x1 mini grinder (clear)
x1 medium clear stash pot (screw top)
x1 doob tube 
x1 wooden plant label including 2 seeds
x5 sticker slaps

1. You can use your N.O.CONTAINER as a stash container
2. Turn it into a grow pot using seeds attached to the plant label (feminised ch9 pic n mix). N.O.Container has drain holes and the lid turns into a handy tray to catch any water soak. You just need to add soil, water and owl your love!

Great to start things off....

For more details check out our Instagram page @nightowlconnoisseurs or our website www.nightowlconnoisseurs.info
Follow us and you may even win a limited edition version.... 

Bulk buys welcome!

Put YOUR Logos/Words/Images/Photos on products like these for the freshest design & print hoot us at hoot@nightowlconnoisseurs.info

This item is sold a gift or novelty item, we DO NOT grow or sell any illegal substances.

name: N.O.C TIGHT VAC STASH CONTAINERS
description:
KEEP YOUR BITS AND BOBS FRESH....
Safe. Sealed. Secure. NOC Tightvac storage containers are designed for connoisseurs who need flexibility in storage.

Tightvacs are NO1 in storage containers, stylish modern design with a patented Tightvac vacuum closure system that displaces air to create an airtight, water-resistant smell-proof, vacuum seal!
Tightvacs are made from a durable, long lasting, FOOD SAFE high impact plastic. Unlike all other containers you simply press the button and pull the cap up or press the button and push the cap down, it's really this simple.

Just about everything you can think of can go into a Tightvac: Coffee, tea, garden bulbs, cheeses, lettuces, cotton balls, sugar, jewelry, crackers, nuts and bolts, spices, roaches, grains, vitamins & anything & everything in or out of the fridge or cupboard. 

Indoor or outdoor! great for parties/music festivals, It will float in any water situation - canoeing, boating you name it! It will keep things dry or FRESH all year round, no matter the season!

It's the container for the people.  The easy to open and close lids; no more achy hands!!! A spill proof easy on/off vacuum seal container that can be used anywhere.

Dimensions:  
3" tall x 1 - 5/8"diameter (7.6 cm x 4 cm) 
Capacity: .5 oz / .06 Liter / 14g.

TightVac - pocket size

Option 1 - NOC Branded Tight Vac
Option 2 - YOUR brand/image Tight Vac (hoot us with your colour preferences)

options.name: CLEAR WITH GREEN LID NOC BRANDED TIGHT VAC
BLACK WITH GREEN LID NOC BRANDED TIGHT VAC
YOUR BRAND TIGHT VAC (hoot us for colour preference)

name: N.O.C-Tainers
description:
Dispensing The Freshest Containers to keep your bits and bobs safe, odourless, and air tight. Not to mention they look dope and stylish... So say goodbye to The BAGGIE! and watch your strain collection grow.

We offer NOC branded containers or for a small extra cost you can customise anything in our shop with your own logo or image. Hoot us with your logos/images to create your own branded products.

1. STACK-ABLES IN THREE SIZES
Clear and stack-able, top edge screws into bottom edge of same size  canister...

- SMALL x5 CANISTERS 
   (each 4cm diameter 1.5cm deep. overall 9cm high)
- MEDIUM x4 CANISTERS
   (each 5cm diameter 2.5cm deep. overall 10cm high)
- LARGE x4 CANISTERS
   (each 7cm diameter 2.5cm deep. overall 10cm high)

2. ACRYLIC CONCENTRATE/NUG CONTAINERS (Screw lids)
Clear to show off your bits and bobs.

-SMALL   x3   - 2.5cm diameter, 3cm high (perfect for seed collections!)
-MEDIUM x2  - 4cm diameter,  2cm high
-LARGE   x1   - 4cm diameter, 5cm high

3. 7 DAY CLEAR MEDI POTS (pop top lid)
    x7 1 gram medi pots (3cm deep x 3cm high)

4. CLAMP TOP MINI JARS (preserve your stash!)
    6.5cm deep x 5cm wide
    
5. Tight VAC (vacuum  closure)
    7cm x 6cm .12 Litre (pocket sized)

YOU CAN ALWAYS CUSTOMISE THE PRODUCTS IN OUR SHOP WITH YOUR LOGO/IMAGES. HOOT at us for more info or send your files for us to check out, this is  important for print quality. We accept high res jpgs, pdfs, psd, ai, eps.

name: N.O.C STASH KEYRING
description:
A wonderfully discreet N.O.C keyring.

• Perfect for carrying your medication when on the move.
• Keeping the contents dry & secure is a protective rubber seal.
• length approx 50mm, Diameter approx 14mm, Weight approx 10g
• Made of high quality aluminum.

Customise with your logo? Send us your image and we will do the rest!
hoot@nightowlconnoisseurs.info

If you need STICKERS CREATED or DESIGNED then hoot us at nightowlconnoisseurs.info or through the contacts page here.

name: BRANDED PLANT LABELS
description:
Funk up your grow and put YOUR logo or words on wooden plant labels.

Label size approx. 10cm x 2cm

Small quantities welcome! Seeds not included, sorry!!!

Email us first before purchasing this item with your desired image or wording. 
Once you approve then place your order and we will get creating.
The cost includes set up/art-working.
Any repeat orders will be a little cheaper as we will have your artwork on file.

Buy a set of 3 N.O.C branded wooden labels - 6 seeds included (ch9 feminised strain unknown).

options.name: x20 YOUR brand wooden labels x20

name: CUSTOM CANVAS PRINTING
description:
We love printing your amazing photos.
Why not turn one into a canvas to show off your gardening
skills today!

High-quality canvas wall art; deep, vibrant, fade resistant


Creating your own canvas: 

1. Email us with  your image, and your requirements.
2. Await an image proof of canvas from us. No printing is started without your approvals.
3. Buy the size you desire.
4. We will do the rest.

Image sizing and correction is FREE of charge, so why not get creative and ask us to get arty with your images.

Hoot us for different sizes or bulk orders.

You can buy the canvas shown. Photo of flowering Blue Cheese by N.O.C green. ONLY 10 AVAILABLE - 12x12inch - £10.00
